reviewText: Four stars for the film, which as a "making of" documentary about a film that never ended up getting made--shades of "Lost in La Mancha"--is a fascinating object of meta-cinema and auto-critique.  Minus one star for the cover, which has the name of the director MISSPELLED.  Making it worse, is the fact that it's the biggest word on the cover.  It's Pasolini, idiots, not Passolini.  Gawd.
